title: Chocolate and cherry terrine with berry coulis
ingredients: ['For the terrine', '200g dried pitted cherries', '200ml freshly made tea', '50ml brandy', '200g dark chocolate, broken into pieces', '85g unsalted butter', '85g caster sugar', '3 eggs, separated', '20g cocoa powder', '300ml double cream', 'For the sauce', '450g raspberries', '110g redcurrants, picked', '30g blackcurrants, picked', '110g caster sugar', '60ml framboise liqueur or Kirsch']
